```{r include=FALSE}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
results <- tar_read(results_regression) %>% filter(outcome=="lymphoma")
results
```

```{r}
results %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=model, y=estimate)) +
    geom_pointrange(aes(ymin=conf.low, ymax=conf.high)) +
    coord_flip() +
    geom_hline(yintercept=1, lty=2)

```
